EmailTemplate.subject: Bad Elf GPS Now Available in GoDirect Flight Bag Pro v1.7
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect%E2%84%A2-flight-bag-pro]]> We are excited to share GoDirect™ Flight Bag Pro <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect%E2%84%A2-flight-bag-pro]]> now supports both the Bad Elf GPS Pro <[[https://bad-elf.com/products/be-gps-2200]]> and Bad Elf GPS Pro+ <[[https://bad-elf.com/pages/be-gps-2300-detail]]> Bluetooth GPS devices.
Pairing one of these devices with your iPad will provide more accurate GPS position data when activating and flying a route while in GoFly mode. This also means you can record a more accurate track log to a trip kit for review after your flight.
Look for more new features and updates in 2019!
Thank you,
The Honeywell GoDirect Team
